title: Happy Hour #22: Apologies to Boyfriends Past
itunes:title: Happy Hour #22: Apologies to Boyfriends Past
description:
It's time for the one where we wax poetic about past relationships and what we wish we had known when we were in them. You know, typical happy hour stuff. Expect the first relationship ghost when the bell tolls rum!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
